text: Ma ko Au dela ne hagangalungalua a Cyrus gi haga gila ina aga agu mee, ge e dugu agu mee gii donu. Au ga haga huudonu nia ala huogodoo ala e haele iei mee. Mee gaa hau haga hoou dogu waahale go Jerusalem ga haga maahede agu daangada ala gu galabudi. Deai tangada ne haga ngalua a mee be e hui halahalau gi mee gi heia di mee deenei ai. Go Dimaadua go di Gowaa Aamua dela ne helekai.”
